00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_FILE/simbio_file_upload.inc.php';
00032 
00033 // privileges checking
00034 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'r');
00035 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'w');
00036 
00037 if (!$can_read) {
00038     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You are not authorized to view this section').'</div>');
00039 }
00040 
00041 // max chars in line for file operations
00042 $max_chars = 1024*100;
00043 
00044 if (isset($_POST['doImport'])) {
00045     // check for form validity
00046     if (!$_FILES['importFile']['name']) {
00047         utility::jsAlert(__('Please select the file to import!'));
00048         exit();
00049     } else if (empty($_POST['fieldSep']) OR empty($_POST['fieldEnc'])) {
00050         utility::jsAlert(__('Required fields (*)  must be filled correctly!'));
00051         exit();
00052     } else {
00053         $start_time = time();
00054         // set PHP time limit
00055         set_time_limit(0);
00056         // set ob implicit flush
00057         ob_implicit_flush();
00058         // create upload object
00059         $upload = new simbio_file_upload();
00060         // get system temporary directory location
00061         $temp_dir = sys_get_temp_dir();
00062         $uploaded_file = $temp_dir.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$_FILES['importFile']['name'];
00063         unlink($uploaded_file);
00064         // set max size
00065         $max_size = $sysconf['max_upload']*1024;
00066         $upload->setAllowableFormat(array('.csv'));
00067         $upload->setMaxSize($max_size);
00068         $upload->setUploadDir($temp_dir);
00069         $upload_status = $upload->doUpload('importFile');
00070         if ($upload_status != UPLOAD_SUCCESS) {
00071             utility::jsAlert(__('Upload failed! File type not allowed or the size is more than').($sysconf['max_upload']/1024).' MB'); //mfc
00072             exit();
00073         }
00074         // uploaded file path
00075         $uploaded_file = $temp_dir.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$_FILES['importFile']['name'];
00076         $row_count = 0;
00077         // check for import setting
00078         $record_num = intval($_POST['recordNum']);
00079         $field_enc = trim($_POST['fieldEnc']);
00080         $field_sep = trim($_POST['fieldSep']);
00081         $record_offset = intval($_POST['recordOffset']);
00082         $record_offset = $record_offset-1;
00083         // get current datetime
00084         $curr_datetime = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00085         $curr_datetime = '\''.$curr_datetime.'\'';
00086         // foreign key id cache
00087         $gmd_id_cache = array();
00088         $publ_id_cache = array();
00089         $lang_id_cache = array();
00090         $place_id_cache = array();
00091         $author_id_cache = array();
00092         $subject_id_cache = array();
00093         // read file line by line
00094         $inserted_row = 0;
00095         $file = fopen($uploaded_file, 'r');
00096         while (!feof($file)) {
00097             // record count
00098             if ($record_num > 0 AND $row_count == $record_num) {
00099                 break;
00100             }
00101             // go to offset
00102             if ($row_count < $record_offset) {
00103                 // pass and continue to next loop
00104                 $field = fgetcsv($file, 1024, $field_sep, $field_enc);
00105                 $row_count++;
00106                 continue;
00107             } else {
00108                 // get an array of field
00109                 $field = fgetcsv($file, $max_chars, $field_sep, $field_enc);
00110                 if ($field) {
00111                     // strip escape chars from all fields
00112                     foreach ($field as $idx => $value) {
00113                         $field[$idx] = str_replace('\\', '', trim($value));
00114                         $field[$idx] = $dbs->escape_string($field[$idx]);
00115                     }
00116                     // strip leading field encloser if any
00117                     $title = preg_replace('@^\\\s*'.$field_enc.'@i', '', $field[0]);
00118                     $title = '\''.$title.'\'';
00119                     $gmd_id = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_gmd', 'gmd_id', 'gmd_name', $field[1], $gmd_id_cache);
00120                     $edition = $field[2]?'\''.$field[2].'\'':'NULL';
00121                     $isbn_issn = $field[3]?'\''.$field[3].'\'':'NULL';
00122                     $publisher_id = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_publisher', 'publisher_id', 'publisher_name', $field[4], $publ_id_cache);
00123                     $publish_year = $field[5]?'\''.$field[5].'\'':'NULL';
00124                     $collation = $field[6]?'\''.$field[6].'\'':'NULL';
00125                     $series_title = $field[7]?'\''.$field[7].'\'':'NULL';
00126                     $call_number = $field[8]?'\''.$field[8].'\'':'NULL';
00127                     $language_id = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_language', 'language_id', 'language_name', $field[9], $lang_id_cache);
00128                     $language_id = '\''.$language_id.'\'';
00129                     $publish_place_id = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_place', 'place_id', 'place_name', $field[10], $place_id_cache);
00130                     $classification = $field[11]?'\''.$field[11].'\'':'NULL';;
00131                     $notes = $field[12]?'\''.$field[12].'\'':'NULL';;
00132                     $image = $field[13]?'\''.$field[13].'\'':'NULL';
00133                     $file_att = $field[14]?'\''.$field[14].'\'':'NULL';
00134                     // $authors = preg_replace('@\\\s*'.$field_enc.'$@i', '', $field[15]);
00135                     $authors = trim($field[15]);
00136                     $subjects = trim($field[16]);
00137                     $items = trim($field[17]);
00138                     // sql insert string
00139                     $sql_str = "INSERT IGNORE INTO biblio (title, gmd_id, edition,
00140                         isbn_issn, publisher_id, publish_year,
00141                         collation, series_title, call_number,
00142                         language_id, publish_place_id, classification,
00143                         notes, image, file_att, input_date, last_update)
00144                             VALUES ($title, $gmd_id, $edition,
00145                             $isbn_issn, $publisher_id, $publish_year,
00146                             $collation, $series_title, $call_number,
00147                             $language_id, $publish_place_id, $classification,
00148                             $notes, $image, $file_att, $curr_datetime, $curr_datetime)";
00149                     // send query
00150                     $dbs->query($sql_str);
00151                     $biblio_id = $dbs->insert_id;
00152                     if (!$dbs->error) {
00153                         $inserted_row++;
00154                         // set authors
00155                         if (!empty($authors)) {
00156                             $biblio_author_sql = 'INSERT IGNORE INTO biblio_author (biblio_id, author_id, level) VALUES ';
00157                             $authors = explode('><', $authors);
00158                             foreach ($authors as $author) {
00159                                 $author = trim(str_replace(array('>', '<'), '', $author));
00160                                 $author_id = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_author', 'author_id', 'author_name', $author, $author_id_cache);
00161                                 $biblio_author_sql .= " ($biblio_id, $author_id, 2),";
00162                             }
00163                             // remove last comma
00164                             $biblio_author_sql = substr_replace($biblio_author_sql, '', -1);
00165                             // execute query
00166                             $dbs->query($biblio_author_sql);
00167                             // echo $dbs->error;
00168                         }
00169                         // set topic
00170                         if (!empty($subjects)) {
00171                             $biblio_subject_sql = 'INSERT IGNORE INTO biblio_topic (biblio_id, topic_id, level) VALUES ';
00172                             $subjects = explode('><', $subjects);
00173                             foreach ($subjects as $subject) {
00174                                 $subject = trim(str_replace(array('>', '<'), '', $subject));
00175                                 $subject_id = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_topic', 'topic_id', 'topic', $subject, $subject_id_cache);
00176                                 $biblio_subject_sql .= " ($biblio_id, $subject_id, 2),";
00177                             }
00178                             // remove last comma
00179                             $biblio_subject_sql = substr_replace($biblio_subject_sql, '', -1);
00180                             // execute query
00181                             $dbs->query($biblio_subject_sql);
00182                             // echo $dbs->error;
00183                         }
00184                         // items
00185                         if (!empty($items)) {
00186                             $item_sql = 'INSERT IGNORE INTO item (biblio_id, item_code) VALUES ';
00187                             $item_array = explode('><', $items);
00188                             foreach ($item_array as $item) {
00189                                 $item = trim(str_replace(array('>', '<'), '', $item));
00190                                 $item_sql .= " ($biblio_id, '$item'),";
00191                             }
00192                             // remove last comma
00193                             $item_sql = substr_replace($item_sql, '', -1);
00194                             // execute query
00195                             $dbs->query($item_sql);
00196                         }
00197                     }
00198                 }
00199                 $row_count++;
00200             }
00201         }
00202         // close file handle
00203         fclose($file);
00204         $end_time = time();
00205         $import_time_sec = $end_time-$start_time;
00206         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'bibliography', 'Importing '.$inserted_row.' bibliographic records from file : '.$_FILES['importFile']['name']);
00207         echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00208         echo 'parent.$(\'importInfo\').update(\'<strong>'.$inserted_row.'</strong> records inserted successfully to bibliographic database, from record <strong>'.$_POST['recordOffset'].' in '.$import_time_sec.' second(s)</strong>\');'."\n";
00209         echo 'parent.$(\'importInfo\').setStyle( {display: \'block\'} );'."\n";
00210         echo '</script>';
00211         exit();
00212     }
00213 }
00214 ?>

00216 <div class="menuBoxInner importIcon">
00217     <?php echo __('IMPORT TOOL'); ?>
00218     <hr />
00219     <?php echo __('Import for bibliographics data from CSV file. For guide on CVS fields order and format please refer to documentation or visit <a href="http://senayan.diknas.go.id" target="_blank">Official Website</a>'); ?>
00220 </div>

00225 // create new instance
00226 $form = new simbio_form_table_AJAX('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'], 'post');
00227 $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="doImport" value="'.__('Import Now').'" class="button"';
00228 
00229 // form table attributes
00230 $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00231 $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00232 $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00233 
00234 /* Form Element(s) */
00235 // csv files
00236 $str_input = simbio_form_element::textField('file', 'importFile');
00237 $str_input .= ' Maximum '.$sysconf['max_upload'].' KB';
00238 $form->addAnything(__('File To Import'), $str_input);
00239 // field separator
00240 $form->addTextField('text', 'fieldSep', __('Field Separator').'*', ''.htmlentities(',').'', 'style="width: 10%;" maxlength="3"');
00241 //  field enclosed
00242 $form->addTextField('text', 'fieldEnc', __('Field Enclosed With').'*', ''.htmlentities('"').'', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00243 // number of records to import
00244 $form->addTextField('text', 'recordNum', __('Number of Records To Export (0 for all records)'), '0', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00245 // records offset
00246 $form->addTextField('text', 'recordOffset', __('Start From Record'), '1', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00247 // output the form
00248 echo $form->printOut();
00249 ?>
